mapper.sql: id, contacts, phone, telephone, address, remarks, is_active, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select * from supplier s WHERE 1=1
AND s.contacts LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contacts}, '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into supplier
id,
contacts,
phone,
telephone,
address,
remarks,
is_active,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update supplier
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update supplier set contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
